name: Mackenzie Balanced Allocation ETF
longDescription: The ETF seeksto provide long-term capital growth with a moderate level of income. The Fund investing in global equity and fixed income securities. In order to achieve its investment objective, Mackenzie Balanced Allocation ETF invests in global equity and fixed-income securities. The Portfolio Manager seeks to maintain a long- term strategic asset allocation of approximately 60% equity securities and 40% fixed income securities (under normal market conditions).

fullAddress: 180 Queen Street West, Toronto, ON, CA
